member.name: IEnterpriseDropTarget.IsEvaluatingEdpPolicy
member.summary: Indicates whether the drop target is intends to handle the evaluation of the enterprise protection policy.
member.param: A boolean value that indicates whether the drop target intends to handle the evaluation of enterprise protection policy.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IEnterpriseDropTarget.SetDropSourceEnterpriseId
member.summary: Provides the drop target with the enterprise ID of the drop source.
member.param: The enterprise identity of the drop source.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IEnterpriseDropTarget
member.summary: When implemented by the drop target application, this interface gives the OLE drag and drop engine the ability to determine whether the drop target application intends to evaluate enterprise protection policy and gives the OLE drag and drop engine a way to provide the enterprise ID of the drop source application to the drop target application.
